message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its uniqueness and value, but I believe I can offer a more reasonable price. How about $17000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $19000. It's still a great deal considering the product's value and uniqueness.
Hello Alice, I've given it some thought and would like to counter with an offer of $18000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.

I understand you're trying to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $18500. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value and my budget, I would like to propose $18000 as the final price for the product.

I understand you're close to your budget, Bob. However, I'm still looking to get a bit more value for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $18250. It's the last offer I can make, and I think it's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $18000. This brings us closer to my budget while still respecting the value of the product.

I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $18200. It's the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
After giving it further consideration, I am willing to meet Alice halfway at $18100. I believe this price respects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
